reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on differentiating between similar room types, specifically the three bedrooms and the two bathrooms, and distinguishing between the front and rear balconies. The main living areas were easily identified: Image_1 shows the living room facing the entrance (玄關), Image_2 captures the full open concept (客餐廳開放空間), Image_3 focuses on the dining area next to the large window, and Image_4 is the kitchen close-up. Bedrooms were differentiated by window size and wall color/decor: Bedroom 1 ([Image_7]/[Image_8]) has a small window and brown curtains; Bedroom 2 ([Image_9]/[Image_10]) has a large window and light green curtains; the Suite Bedroom ([Image_13]/[Image_14]) has beige walls and the crucial visual evidence of a connecting bathroom door in Image_14. Bathrooms were distinguished by lighting and storage: Bathroom 1 ([Image_11]/[Image_12]) has bright white light and horizontal wooden shelves; Bathroom 2 ([Image_15]/[Image_16]) has warmer, yellowish light (燈光偏黃) and a corner wooden shelf. The remaining utility spaces (balconies and storage) were uniquely identifiable.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the sofa and the main entrance door, confirming the '玄關區明確' tag.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光尚可(單側窗戶自然光), 通風可(有窗與陽台門可對流), 格局方正(客廳呈矩形好擺家具), 天花高度一般(無壓迫感樑線不明顯), 地板新穎(木紋地板狀況佳), 基本家具(含沙發與收納櫃可立即入住), 玄關區明確(大門旁留鞋櫃與落塵區空間)

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide shot capturing the seamless connection between the living area, dining area, and kitchen, matching '客餐廳開放空間' and '空間寬敞'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(大面窗加陽台拉門), 通風佳(陽台門與室內形成對流), 開放式格局(客廳餐廳廚房連通動線順暢), 空間寬敞(長條大空間適合家庭活動), 地板新(連續木紋地板整體感佳), 溫暖照明(多處吊燈與筒燈光線均勻), 家具好配置(餐桌與沙發示意可容納多人)

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the dining table next to a large window, with the kitchen cabinets visible nearby, matching '餐廳' and '與廚房連通'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 大面窗採光佳(窗邊用餐區明亮), 通風良好(窗戶可開啟排熱氣味), 格局方正(長方型餐廳好擺大餐桌), 與廚房連通(上菜動線短適合家庭聚餐), 地板易清潔(木紋地板維護方便), 照明充足(吊燈與主燈雙光源), 氣氛舒適(淺色牆面與木質家具營造溫馨)

matching_result_list.evidence: Close-up of the white, one-line kitchen setup, confirming '一字型廚房' and '收納充足'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光有限(僅端部窄窗光線較弱), 通風基本(有對外窗可換氣), 適合作儲藏室(狹長空間不利當臥室), 牆面為防水材質(磁磚牆較耐潮), 高挑感尚可(垂直高度看起來充足可做層架)
